I'm happy to help you with romantic comedy recommendations! However, I have to clarify that I couldn't find any information on a romantic comedy called "Love in the Time of Pride." It's possible that it's a lesser-known or new release, or it might be a mistaken title.

But don't worry, I'd be happy to suggest some popular and heartwarming romantic comedies that you might enjoy! Here are a few:

1. Crazy Rich Asians (2018) - A fun and glamorous rom-com about a woman who discovers her boyfriend is from an extremely wealthy family in Singapore.
2. To All the Boys I've Loved Before (2018) - A sweet and charming Netflix original about a high school girl whose secret love letters are accidentally sent to her crushes.
3. The Big Sick (2017) - A romantic comedy based on the real-life story of a comedian who falls in love with a graduate student, but their relationship is put to the test when she falls into a coma.
4. Love, Simon (2018) - A heartwarming and relatable film about a closeted high school boy who falls in love with an anonymous classmate online.
5. My Big Fat Greek Wedding (2002) - A classic rom-com about a Greek woman who falls in love with a non-Greek man and the cultural clashes that ensue.
6. Bridget Jones's Diary (2001) - A witty and charming adaptation of the novel about a single woman in London who struggles with love, relationships, and self-improvement.
7. Sleepless in Seattle (1993) - A romantic classic about a widower's son who calls in to a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a new partner.
8. The Proposal (2009) - A fun and sexy rom-com about a demanding boss who forces her assistant to pretend to be her fiancé, but they end up falling for each other.
9. 10 Things I Hate About You (1999) - A modern retelling of Shakespeare's The Taming of the Shrew set in a high school, starring Heath Ledger and Julia Stiles.
10. My Best Friend's Wedding (1997) - A hilarious and relatable film about a woman who realizes she's in love with her best friend just as he's about to get married.

I hope you find something you like in this list!
